MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.45pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Goshen Place substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.29pm on Sunday, 11 October 2020
